alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 11 at 10:23PM EDT until July 12 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Falls Village. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Flood stage. The park above Falls Village Dam begins to flood, and water reaches the fields of White Hollow Farms near Limerock Road, and is at the edge of the Housatonic Valley Regional High School fields. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 7.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 5.7 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.5 feet on 04/06/1984. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Tue 9 pm: 7.5 Forecast: Tue 9 pm 7.5 Wed 2 am 7.4 Wed 8 am 7.2 Wed 2 pm 7.0 Wed 8 pm 6.8 Thu 2 am 6.6 Thu 8 am 6.4 Thu 2 pm 6.1 Thu 8 pm 5.9 Fri 2 am 5.7 Fri 8 am 5.6 Fri 2 pm 5.6 &&
